description: Metal ring added (where no metal ring was present), position (on tarsus or above) unknown or unrecorded.
Metal ring added (where no metal ring was present), definitely on tarsus.
Metal ring added (where no metal ring was present), definitely above tarsus.
Metal ring removed and bird released alive (use code 4 if bird was dead).

Metal ring added, where a metal ring was already present. N.b. within EURING there is an explicit agreement that ringers must not add a metal ring when one is already present (except in circumstances where the existing ring needs to be replaced because of wear).
